li.a: Student Handbook, Dress Code, and Code of Conduct

div.p: DHS Tennis Team came in 3rd place at Uvalde Invitational. Brook Runyan, 1st place; Cameron English, 2nd place; Jake Harrell, Consolation; Corwin Flores/Denton Zuercher, Consolation. Congratulations!
FCCLA Students presented their project to the school board at the December 16th board meeting
FCCLA project, Konquering Kindness, was presented to the Int. campus. Please click image for more information on this and other FCCLA projects.
